com.axelor.studio.service

Class ReportBuilderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ReportBuilderService

  • public class ReportBuilderService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class generate html template from selected metaView for ReportBuilder. It also add button into MetaView selected as buttonView in ReportBuilder.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • generateTemplate

        public java.lang.String generateTemplate(com.axelor.meta.db.MetaView metaView)
        Method create html template from MetaView. This is root method to create template. Html contains table with two columns. If field is o2m/m2m it will take full row span.
        Parameters:
        metaView - MetaView to process
        Returns:
        Html template generated.

      • processView

        private void processView(java.lang.String xml)
                  throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Method parse given xml to create html.
        Parameters:
        xml - View xml passed.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Xml parsing exception.

      • processAbstractWidget

        private void processAbstractWidget(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget widget,
                         java.lang.Boolean sidePanel)
        Check given AbstractWidget and process it according to its type.
        Parameters:
        widget - AbstractWidget to process
        sidePanel - Boolean to check if widget is sidePanel.

      • processPanel

        private void processPanel(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.Panel panel,
                java.lang.Boolean sidePanel)
        Process panel to create html from it and to process items of panels. It add panel title in full row span of html table.
        Parameters:
        panel - Panels to process.
        sidePanel - Boolean to check if panel is sidePanel.

      • processField

        private void processField(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.PanelField field,
                java.lang.Boolean sidePanel,
                java.lang.String colSpan)
        Process PanelField and extend html table of html template.
        Parameters:
        field - PanelField to process.
        sidePanel - Boolean to check if field is in sidePanel.
        colSpan - Colspan of field.

      • processRelational

        private java.lang.String processRelational(java.lang.String name,
                                 MetaField metaField)
        Check given metaField and process relational field to create proper string template friendly string.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of field.
        metaField - MetaField to process.
        Returns:
        Template friendly string created for relational field.

        private java.lang.String getNameColumn(java.lang.String name,

        Get nameColumn for given relational metaField.
        Parameters:

        metaField - MetaField to check.
        Returns:

      • generateHtml

        private void generateHtml(boolean sidePanel)
        Method generate main html table of html template, from 'panels' and 'sidePanels' list created during view xml processing.
        Parameters:
        sidePanel - Boolean to check which panel list to process.

      • getFieldTitle

        private java.lang.String getFieldTitle(java.lang.String name,
                             MetaField metaField)
        It returns title of MetaField and if title is empty it create human readable title from field name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of field.
        metaField - MetaField to process.
        Returns:
        Title of field.

      • getMetaField

        private MetaField getMetaField(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String modelName)
        Method to get MetaField record from field name and model.
        Parameters:
        name - Field name to search.
        modelName - Model of field.
        Returns:
        Return MetaField found.

      • updateButtonView

        public void updateButtonView(com.axelor.meta.db.MetaView buttonView)
        Add button in buttonView(MetaView). It create ViewEditor for buttonView and print button in toolbar.
        Parameters:
        buttonView - MetaView to add button.

      • processPanelRelated

        public void processPanelRelated(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.PanelRelated panelRelated,
                       java.lang.Boolean sidePanel,
                       java.lang.String colSpan)
        Process panelRelated and update 'panels' or 'sidePanels' list with new table created for panelRelated.
        Parameters:
        panelRelated - PanelRelated to process.
        sidePanel - Boolean to check if panelRelated is sidePanel.
        colSpan - Colspan to add in panel lists.

      • createTable

        private java.lang.String createTable(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.PanelRelated panelRelated,
                           java.lang.String refModel)
        Process panelRelated to find right grid view of reference model. Grid view used to create html table.
        Parameters:
        panelRelated - PanelRelated to use.
        refModel - Name of model refer by panelRelated.
        Returns:
        Html table string created.

      • getHtmlTable

        private java.lang.String getHtmlTable(java.lang.String fieldName,
                            java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> widgets,
                            java.lang.String refModel)
        Create html table string from list of widgets(Items of grd view).
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of relational field.
        widgets - List of widgets in reference model's grid view.
        refModel - Name of reference model.
        Returns:
        Html table created.
